mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_CATEGORY, ITEM_TITLE, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_IMAGE, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_REGDATE, ITEM_ACTIVE, ITEM_QUAN FROM BOARD_ITEM WHERE ITEM_ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY ITEM_NO DESC

SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_CATEGORY, ITEM_TITLE, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_IMAGE, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_REGDATE, ITEM_ACTIVE, ITEM_QUAN FROM BOARD_ITEM WHERE ITEM_ACTIVE = 'Y' AND ITEM_CATEGORY = #{item_category} ORDER BY ITEM_NO DESC
SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_CATEGORY, ITEM_TITLE, ITEM_CONTENT, ITEM_IMAGE, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_REGDATE, ITEM_ACTIVE, ITEM_QUAN FROM BOARD_ITEM WHERE ITEM_ACTIVE = 'Y' AND ITEM_NO = #{item_no}
SELECT DISTINCT ITEM_CATEGORY FROM BOARD_ITEM WHERE ITEM_ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY ITEM_CATEGORY
